casebody.data:
PEDEN GENERAL CONTRACTORS, INC., Plaintiff
v.
Carol BENNETT, d/b/a Brighton Stables, Defendant and
Peden General Contractors, Inc., Third-Party Plaintiff
v.
Ceco Building Systems, A Division of Robertson-Ceco Corporation; and J. Devereux Joslin, P.E., Third Party Defendants and
Carol Bennett, d/b/a Brighton Stables, Cross-Claimant
v.
Ceco Building Systems, A Division of Robertson-Ceco Corporation, Cross-Defendant. No. 499P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 1, 2005. Carol Bennett, Pro Se. W. Sidney Aldridge, Raleigh, for Peden General Contractors. James L. Gale, Elizabeth Brooks Scherer, Raleigh, for Ceco Building Systems.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 7th day of September 2005 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review (writ of certiorari) of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st day of December 2005."
